segments.text: Let's go to Burger Queen for lunch . They have good cheese burgers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I am hungry , too . I like their milkshake . They're very creamy and tasty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the long line , there are always a lot of people waiting in lines just for the cheese burger . It must be very delicious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup . But , this also means we have to wait to order our food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . It is worth waiting . Their cheese burgers are really popular . Once you have it , you will love it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sounds very attractive . I just tried their vanilla milkshake last time , and it was really delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yup , they have good French fries as well . Not very thick , but crispy enough . You should try them with some mayonnaise sauce . That is the Belgium style . You will love it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I think I know what to order for my lunch now . But , eating too much fried food really makes me fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . You just have it once in a while , not every day . It will not harm you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . You can hear my tummy grumbling . I am really hungry !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be patient . Good food never comes fast .
segments.speaker: S1
